description:
Heegondhu Dina | Juke Box
Sindhu Loknath
Directed by Vikram Yoganand
Produced by Chandrashekar
Praveen tej, Guru Prasad, Padmaja Rao, Nagendra Sha, Shobraj, Shankar Narayan, Mitra, Giri, Balaji Manohar and Girija Lokesh
Written by Vikas V
Music by Abhilash Gupta
D O P by Vikram Yoganand
Lyrics by Ramakrishna Ranagatti
Editing & VFX by Vikram Yoganand
Photography by Pavendan
Colorist : Suresh SR and Penta Prism
Singers : Sinchana Dixith, Sparsha R.K, Supriya lohith and Abhilash Gupta
Associate Directors : Gautham Nayak, Pavan Venugopal and Pradeep Parameshwar.


1. Baduke achchari

Music : Abhilash Gupta 
Singer: Abhilash Gupta 
Lyrics : Ramakrishna Ranagatti 
Music programming, Guitars, Additional vocals : Mahesh Jude Pereira 
Drums : Shanmukharao Bunga
Mixing and Mastering : Mahesh Jude Pereira 
Recorded at Psylence Studios, BTM Layout 


2. Nade nade

Music : Abhilash Gupta 
Singers: Supriya Lohith
Lyrics : Ramakrishna Ranagatti 
Music programming, Guitars : Mahesh Jude Pereira 
Mixing and Mastering : Gokul Abhishek 
Recorded at Psylence Studios, BTM Layout 


3. Heegondu Dina Title track

Music : Abhilash Gupta 
Singers: Sinchan Dixit 
Lyrics : Ramakrishna Ranagatti 
Music programming, Guitars: Mahesh Jude Pereira 
Drums : Shanmukharao Bunga
Chorus : Abhilash Gupta, Shree Narayanan N. S
Mixing and Mastering : Mahesh Jude Pereira 
Recorded at Arun Studio, Chamarajpet 


4. Sanchalana 

Music : Abhilash Gupta 
Singers: Sparsha R K, Abhilash Gupta 
Lyrics : Ramakrishna Ranagatti 
Music programming, Guitars, Additional vocals : Mahesh Jude Pereira 
Additional programming : Ajay Samma
Drums : Shanmukharao Bunga
Mixing and Mastering : Gokul Abhishek 
Recorded at Arun Studio, Chamarajpet 
And  Psylence Studios, BTM Layout 

Bit songs
1. Heege Munde Saagu

Music : Abhilash Gupta 
Singer: Abhilash Gupta 
Lyrics : Ramakrishna Ranagatti 
Music programming, Guitars: Mahesh Jude Pereira 
Recorded at Psylence Studios, BTM Layout 

2. Madhyanthara

Music : Abhilash Gupta 
Singers: Supriya Lohith
Lyrics : Ramakrishna Ranagatti 
Additional vocals : Abhilash Gupta 
Music programming, Guitars : Mahesh Jude Pereira 
Recorded at Psylence Studios, BTM Layout 


Don't forget to Subscribe, Like & Share this video among all your friends.

Dayavittu naavu helodella Nambabedi, Nambi Mutthaalaraagabedi... Sumne yenu thale kedskolde ee video nodi."

"Roast andre yenu antha gothaagabekaadre Roast (comedy) na Google maadi. nammanna Bitbidi."

Vikram Yoganand | Pavan Venugopal | Sindhu Loknath

Presenting The Official Video of "Heegondhu Dina (Title Track)" from "Heegondhu Dina" 
Directed by Vikram Yoganand
starring Sindhu Lokanath.

Song : Heegondhu Dina (Title Track)
Singers : Sinchan Dixit
Music : Abhilash Gupta
Lyricist : Ramakrishna Ranagatti
Mixing and Mastering : Gokul Abhishek 
Recorded at Psylence Studios, BTM Layout

Condom Challenge - First Time In Indian | Smart Screen Productions

The “condom challenge” is a viral video that involves people -- mostly teenagers -- filling a condom with water and then dropping it on to the head of their willing victim.

When it drops, the condom breaks open to cover the head of the participant, enclosing them in a temporary latex-and-water prison.

Appa My Hero - Official Teaser [2014] | Smart Screen Productions

A brief look at human behavior and the dynamics of relationships within a family. While it is an accepted belief that a parent will readily sacrifice for their child, there are moments however transient when reluctance creeps in. So, what's the right thing to do ? Moralities often determine the outcome. We present one of them.

Shor mein bhi yeh; Khamoshi hai Kyun?
